name: Soul-Shear Reaper
description: Periodically summons scythes to deal 80% weapon damage. Mana drains over time.

name: Archon's Last Bastion
description: Grants replenishing shield equal to 1000% max HP. Max HP is set to 1.

name: Bloodsurge
description: Heals for 50% damage dealt.

name: Burning focus
description: Increase damage by 10%

name: Sun's blessing
description: Decreases damage taken by 20%

name: Withered thorns
description: 5x Mana regen. 2x damage taken

name: Chillblood
description: Slows attackers by 20%

name: Sanctified Aegis
description: Grants 5% Max HP every 5 seconds

name: Hollow void
description: Spells create void echoes for 80% effectiveness. Lose 1% HP per second

name: Radiance
description: 5% chance to blind nearby enemies

name: Smite touch
description: Attacks deal bonus holy damage

name: Damned grasp
description: 50% increased damage. Critical hits deal 5% damage to you

name: Phase shift
description: 5% chance to ignore hits

name: Warden's March
description: Reduces slow effectiveness by 50%

name: Plaguelands
description: Ignore damage over time. Deal damage over time to nearby villagers

name: Gale step
description: Grants 10% haste

name: Celestial tracks
description: Grants 40% move speed every 10 seconds

name: Burdened soles
description: Leave behind a hallowed trail that damages enemies. Move speed reduced by 35%

name: Sanctuary
description: Holy ground affects the floor around you, granting immunity and aggro from enemies.

name: Hallowed mist
description: Hallowed mist surrounds you, healing for 1% HP every second. Lose 5% mana per second

name: Blazefang
description: Deals 10% extra damage as fire

name: Dawnrender
description: Heals HP for 2% crit damage

name: Fallen Seraph
description: Deals damage equal to 10% of enemy max HP. You take 1% damage per hit.

name: Stormcleaver
description: Deals 10% damage to 4 nearby enemies

name: Titanfall
description: Every 3rd attack will swing around you instead

name: Grieved Titan
description: Attacks deal 50% extra damage below half health. Your HP is locked to 50%

name: Frostspire
description: Deals 10% extra damage as frost

name: Astral Conduit
description: 10% chance to spawn a cosmic orbiting shard

name: Hollow Nebula
description: Your spells fire a void bolt with 40% effectiveness. You lose 1% HP permanently.

name: Soul Reaper
description: Restore 1% HP on kill

name: Borrowed time
description: Kills Grant 1% increased attack power and attack speed temporarily. This effect stacks to 20.

name: Sentinel
description: 20% chance to block full damage

name: Dawnforge
description: Creates a healing barrier every 20 seconds

name: Fallen mirror
description: Reflect 50% damage taken. You bleed for 2% of damage every second for 10 seconds

name: First ember
description: Spells make enemies take 5% of Max HP as fire damage

name: Fey herald
description: 5% chance to summon a fae wisp to fight by your side. No limit on summons

name: Unquenched hunger
description: Doubles soul absorbed. Take 1% damage for every soul absorbed

name: Encroach
description: Periodically pulses lightning waves

name: Yrmvikar
description: Grants regenerative absorb shield equal to 30% Max HP.

name: Forgotten omnilith
description: 50% increased damage. Your reputation is permanently set to -100, can't be reversed.

name: Arrows of the first light
description: Bow fires light piercing arrows, not requiring physical arrows.
